name: Tapped Out! Plane
description:
This Flash based game was made for Kenney Jam 2019.

This Flash based game was made for Kenney Jam 2019. I have made it in one day since I had my high school exams going on. So I think of improving it later on. It may have many bugs right now.

Controls - 

SPACEBAR to fly.

 Z to shoot

Enter to Pause

Asset Packs used - 

Tappy Plane Pack

Platformer Complete Art Pack

Toy Bricks Pack
